name: NSColorPickingDefault
desc: A set of methods that provides basic behavior for a color picker.

items.name: init?(pickerMask: Int, colorPanel: NSColorPanel)
items.desc: Initializes the receiver with a given color panel and its mode.

items.name: func insertNewButtonImage(NSImage, in: NSButtonCell)
items.desc: Sets the image of a given button cell.

items.name: func provideNewButtonImage() -> NSImage
items.desc: Provides the image of the button used to select the receiver in the color panel.

items.name: func minContentSize() -> NSSize
items.desc: Indicates the receiver’s minimum content size.

items.name: func buttonToolTip() -> String
items.desc: Provides the toolbar button help tag.

items.name: func alphaControlAddedOrRemoved(Any?)
items.desc: Sent when the color panel's opacity controls have been hidden or displayed.

items.name: func viewSizeChanged(Any?)
items.desc: Tells the recever when the color panel's view size changes in a way that might affect the color picker.

items.name: func attachColorList(NSColorList)
items.desc: Tells the receiver to attach the given color list, if it isn’t already displaying the list.

items.name: func detachColorList(NSColorList)
items.desc: Tells the receiver to detach the given color list, unless the receiver isn’t displaying the list.
